name: VaranasiGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Varanasi Guide”
”Alexa Varanasi guide”
”Alexa ask Varanasi guide to tell about attraction in Varanasi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: varanasi guide
des:
Varanasi Guide:-
This guide helps you to find hotels, attractions, bus station and railway station in Varanasi.
You can also go for facts about Varanasi.
For invoke this guide say "Alexa,open Varanasi Guide".
You can search hotels like "Alexa,suggest three star hotel" or 'hotel in Varanasi'.
For finding attraction you can go with "Alexa,recommend an attraction"
This skill also tell about "total no of ghats in Varanasi" and "Famous ghat in Varanasi".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
